title: God's Wisdom
itunes:title: God's Wisdom
description:
We make decisions all day long. Sometimes they can be overwhelming. You may be standing at the threshold of a decision today. The Bible says in James 1:5, "If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask God for it." He'll give it to you generously if you believe.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
